text: Régis Rothenbühler (born 11 October 1970) is a retired Swiss football player. He played as a defender mostly for Neuchâtel Xamax and FC Lugano. He played 19 times for the Switzerland national football team and was a participant at the 1996 UEFA European Championship. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Swiss footballers Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:FC Lugano players Category:UEFA Euro 1996 players Category:Switzerland international footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Régis Rothenbühler
